TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientScriptItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示设计时 Web 窗体或用户控件中的客户端脚本元素。

span.span: Represents a client script element in a Web Form or user control at design time.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示在 `script` 设计时包含在 Web 文档中的元素。The class represents a `script` element that is contained in a Web document at design time. 自定义控件设计器实现可以使用 对象将客户端脚本元素添加到 Web 窗体或用户控件中。A custom control designer implementation can use a object to add client script elements to a Web Form or user control. 在设计时，使用 类设置或检查设计图面上的文档中包含的客户端脚本元素，例如 web 窗体、web 服务器控件、内容页或母版页。At design time, use the class to set or examine client script elements that are contained in a document, such as a Web form, a Web server control, a content page, or a master page, on the design surface. 使用方法检索 Web 文档中包含的客户端脚本元素的集合 。Retrieve the collection of client script elements that are contained within the Web document by using the method. 使用方法将客户端脚本元素添加到 Web 文档中 。Add a client script element to the Web document by using the method. 通常， `script` 元素要么包含 script 语句，要么指定脚本语句的外部位置。Typically, a `script` element either contains script statements or specifies an external location for script statements. `script`元素可以选择定义脚本语句的语言。The `script` element can optionally define the language of the script statements. 使用 构造函数初始化新脚本对象的属性。Use the constructor to initialize the properties for a new script object. 使用 属性检查 `script` 对象特性和内容。Use the properties to examine the `script` object attributes and contents. 属性表示元素的 `language` 特性 `script` 。The property represents the `language` attribute of the `script` element. 属性表示 `src` 特性。The property represents the `src` attribute. 属性表示要在元素中包含的客户端上执行的脚本语句 `script` 。The property represents the script statements to be executed on the client that are contained in the `script` element. 使用 类管理要在设计时执行的脚本。Use the class to manage scripts that are to be executed at design-time. 若要在运行时管理客户端脚本元素，请使用 类。To manage client script elements at run time, use the class. 有关在运行时使用客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100))。For more information about using client scripts at run time, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 类表示 `script` 设计时的元素，这些元素最终在客户端浏览器中进行分析和运行。The class represents `script` elements at design time that are ultimately parsed and run in the client browser. 由于为 `script` 对象生成的元素 不在服务器上运行，因此这些元素不包含 `runat="server"` 特性。Because the `script` elements that are generated for the objects are not run on the server, the elements do not contain the `runat="server"` attribute.

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

new System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem : string * string * string * string * string -> System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: text
param.span: 元素的内容；要在客户端上运行的脚本语句的字符串。

span.span: The contents for the element; a string of script statements to run on the client.

param.name: source
param.span: 元素的 特性值，该值指定客户端脚本内容的外部源位置。

span.span: The attribute value for the element, specifying an external source location for the client script contents.

param.name: language
param.span: 元素的 特性值，该值指定脚本语句的语言。

span.span: The attribute value for the element, specifying the language of the script statements.

param.name: type
param.span: 元素的类型特性值，它表明关联的脚本撰写引擎的 MIME 类型。

span.span: The type attribute value for the element, indicating the MIME type for the associated scripting engine.

param.name: id

span.span: The ID for the element.

param.span: 此参数是设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]）所必需的。

span.span: This argument is required by the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]).

summary.span: 使用提供的参数初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用或参数初始化对象的语句， `text` `source` (不是都) 。Initialize the statements for the object by using either the `text` or `source` parameter (not both). 使用 `text` 可使用包含语句的输入字符串初始化脚本。Use `text` to initialize the script using an input string that contains the statements. 或者，使用 `source` 来使用包含脚本语句的路径初始化脚本。Alternately, use `source` to initialize a script using a path that contains the script statements. 您可以指定任何输入参数为 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) ; 将使用输入值设置相应的属性，并且 `script` 不使用该属性生成元素。You can specify any of the input parameters as `null` or an empty string (""); the corresponding property is set using the input value, and the `script` element is generated without that property. 使用 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) 会生成以下结果：Using `null` or an empty string ("") generates the following results: - 对于 `text` ，对应的 `script` 元素不包含 script 语句。For `text`, the corresponding `script` element does not contain script statements. - 对于 `source` ， `src` 未在元素中设置特性 `script` 。For `source`, the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element. - 对于 `language` ， `language` 未在元素中设置特性 `script` 。For `language`, the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 当客户端脚本块未指定脚本语言时，客户端浏览器将确定语言。When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language. - 对于 `type` ， `type` 不在 script 元素中设置特性。For `type`, the `type` attribute is not set in the script element. 如果客户端脚本块未指定脚本类型，客户端浏览器将确定类型。When a client script block does not specify the script type, the client browser determines the type. - 对于 `id` ，设计宿主 (例如， [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 将引发 。For `id`, the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) will throw an .

span.span: is null (thrown by the design host).

summary.span: 获取客户端脚本元素的 特性值。

span.span: Gets the attribute value for the client script element.

value.span: 为 元素中的 特性指定的语言名称。

span.span: The language name specified for the attribute in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示编写脚本语句所用的语言。The property represents the language in which the script statements are written. 如果 属性为 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) ，则 `language` 不在元素中设置特性 `script` 。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 当客户端脚本块未指定脚本语言时，客户端浏览器将确定语言。When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language. 属性由构造函数进行初始化 。The property is initialized by the constructor.

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为客户端脚本内容指定外部源位置。The property specifies an external source location for the client script contents. 通常， `script` 使用或属性指定元素的脚本语句 。Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the or property. 如果 属性为 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) ，则 `src` 不在元素中设置特性 `script` 。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 属性由初始化 。The property is initialized by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示元素中包含的语句 `script` 。The property represents the statements that are contained in the `script` element. 通常， `script` 使用或属性指定元素的脚本语句 。Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the or property. 如果 属性为 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) ，则元素不 `script` 包含任何脚本语句。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `script` element does not contain any script statements. 属性由构造函数进行初始化 。The property is initialized by the constructor.
